title: Collapsible chatroom header: consistent typography + icon-only compact counts

requirements.summary: Keep chatroom header topic/description text sizing consistent between expanded and collapsed states to avoid font-size layout shift.
acceptanceCriteria: When toggling the header between expanded and collapsed, the chatroom topic text size remains consistent.
When toggling the header between expanded and collapsed, the chatroom description text size remains consistent (if shown in both states).
No layout shift occurs due to font-size changes when toggling.

file_operations.description: Adjust the collapsed header typography classes so the topic (and description, if displayed) uses the same text sizing as the expanded header, preventing font-size-driven layout shift when toggling.

requirements.summary: Show message and active user counts as icon + compact-formatted number (no labels) in both expanded and collapsed header states.
acceptanceCriteria: The header shows a message icon followed by the message count number with no additional label text.
The header shows a users icon followed by the active user count number with no additional label text.
Counts are formatted using compact notation (e.g., 1200 -> "1.2k").
The icon+count elements are visible in both expanded and collapsed header states.

file_operations.description: Update the header counts UI to render MessageCircle/Users icons with numbers only (no label text) and format values via formatCompactNumber for both expanded and collapsed header layouts.
